content: a cute and fun beanie design that is perfect for the whole family the pattern includes multiple colour design options and multiple brim options the included sizing table can be used to size the beanie to a standard size child/teen/woman/man or the beanie can easily be made to a custom size perfect for stash-busting and using up yarn scraps any dk or worsted weight yarn is suitable please note basic pattern with simple brim options only and without stitch images is available for free on my blog please add your projects to ravelry and remember to spam me #grannyspikedmybeanie @thecrochetfix on social media - i very much enjoy seeing your makes thanks to the following testers for your fabulous efforts to test this beanie design margaret richards @snazzycuddles on ig belle9657 on ravelry tania barry @shewgirl1 on ig shewgirl on ravelry laurie vanostrand mnlaurie on ravelry helen maud @helen nanna made on ig richelle cricks @richellecricks on ig richelle362 on ravelry heidi hirnich @handmadeheavenau on ig handmadeheavenaus on etsy jo fowkes @fibreandthreads on ig fb and etsy kathy plumbo @kmplumbo on ig and met1023 on ravelry vimala vignesh @vimalavignesh on ig fb and ravelry heidi english @madhen17 on ig and madhen17 on ravelry skye @skyebomonkey on ig and skyebo on ravelry jennifer snedden @keelawee on ig and keelawee on ravelry carly wynn - @curlywurlin224 on ig isolath @isolathcreations on ig and isolath on ravelry tara mutze katherine wallace wheelie made it crochet on youtube @wheeliemadeitcrochet on ig & wheeliemadeit on ravelry
